name: Press The Button (Stefqn.25)
description:
Press The Button Is A Game Made As A  2h Challenge So Nothing Fancy

Press The Button Is A 2d Game In Which You Try Pressing A button That Always Moves When Hovering Over It

Controls: P to return to menu 

                      H to show a hint

                      Left Click to press the button

                      Secret Key(You May Discover It In Game)

   

Sound By "DominikBraun" Downloaded from Freesounds.org
